nodes.text: Xala's moon was a moon located in the Xala system, in Wild Space that orbited the planet Xala. Approximately 89.94 percent of its surface was covered in frozen oceans. Despite its hostile environment, the moon had a Type 1 atsmosphere and did sustain life: flying reptiles lived in its artic wastelands, and large sea creatures dwelled in its oceans.
Around 18 BBY, Milo and Lina Graf crash-landed there after their old enemy, the disgraced Imperial officer Visler Korda, lured them to the Xala system.
